REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f2109 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-16 0051

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 550 MLN STG LATE HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with late assistance of around 550 mln stg. This takes the Bank's total help today to some 1.12 billion stg and compares with its estimated deficit of around 1.10 billion. REUTER
